content: माध्वीकं [मधुना मधूकपुऽपेण निर्वृत्तं ईकक्] {@--1@} A kind of spirituous liquor, distilled from the flowers of the tree called Madhūka; चचाम मधु माध्वीकं <ls>Bk. 14. 94.</ls> {@--2@} Wine distilled from grapes; साध्वी माध्वीक चिंता न भवति भवतः <ls>Gīt. 12</ls> (= मधो <ab>Com.</ab>). {@--3@} A grape.
